name: Adwised Web Push Notification
author: Adwised

sections.description:
This plugin is a free web push notification service for WordPress websites.
you can add web push notifications to any website via Adwised.
This platform is available for Persian/Farsi language ( We are working on English version)

Web push notifications are notifications that can be sent to a user via desktop web and mobile web.
Web push notifications are delivered on a user’s desktop or mobile screen anytime when they are online.
To use this plugin, you should have an account in adwised.com‘s console in panel.adwised.com

Translations included

=English
=فارسی
sections.installation:
FROM YOUR WORDPRESS DASHBOARD

  • Visit Plugins > Add New
  • Search for adwised
  • Install & activate adwised from your Plugins page.
  • Now you can find adwised under the left menu.
  • Sign in/Sign up in panel.adwised.com and create a website
  • Get your script from panel.adwised.com and enter it in settings page
sections.faq:
How to send web push from adwised?

you can create account in panel.adwised.com , further information is available on adwised.com
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Fixing script bugs

2.0

  • Now you can set adwised popup script on your website

2.1

  • now you can use with cache plugins like wpsol, autoptimizer, wp-rocket and etc

short_description: adwised.com's official web push notification plugin. adwised.com console is only available for Farsi language (English version will come soon).
